item.title: Key --> Chest --> Spawn npc?
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

server.npcHandler.newNPC(npc id?, absX, (absY + 1), heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, false);
use that in your code it should work.

item.title: Key --> Chest --> Spawn npc?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

So i was making myself a torso-minigame but then it hited me its more fun to make it so that you get to fight more then only 1 npc. So i was wondering if theres a code to spawn an npc after using key on the chest ? STARTED:

else if (useItemID == 432 && atObjectID == 6646 )// key on chest { sendMessage("Watch out, here comes another monster!); deleteItem(432,getItemSlot(432), 1); }

But i do NOT know how to make an npc spawn using the key on this chest Any ideas?

Read full topic
